Name: Torpid Module
Description:
Manufacturer: Greycat Industrial
Item Type: Mining Module (Active)

Resistance: -20%
All Charge Rates: -20%
Heat Generation: -20%
Signature Size: -30%
Duration: 90 seconds
Uses: 5

When the Torpid Module interacts with a mining laser, it allows the operator more precise power adjustments for 90 seconds to precisely find a deposit's weak-spot, but slowing the charge rate in the process.
